name: Looppa
tag_list: social-media, platform, social-media-radio-solution, social-media-newspapers-solution, allyssen, tootimes
overview:
LOOPPA is an Internet company based in Buenos Aires, Argentina and was co-founded in late 2007 by Internet entrepreneurs Johni Fisher and Daniel Kohn.

Looppa’s 360” solution is opening the door for television, radio, and newspapers to adapt fully to the new digital age. Together with the platform, applications and staffing support, Looppa’s solution creates far more subscribers, audience loyalty, interactivity, stickiness, and frequency of visits than earlier attempts at this kind of old and new media crossovers. With projects planned around the globe across print, radio, and television.
